name: Chinese Stir-Fried Noodles
recipeIngredient: 2 small squid (trimmed, cleaned, skinned and sliced),
recipeInstructions: 1. In a hot wok fry the garlic and chillies until fragrant.
2. Add the Chinese sausage, followed by the prawns and the squid, tossing them to mix thoroughly.
3. Toss in the noodles and mix well.
4. Add the soy sauce and kepac manis.
5. Add the mustard leaves and beansprouts.
6. Quickly stir in the eggs for a few seconds until set.
7. Season with black pepper, garnish with coriander, and serve.
